sql: SELECT sum(amount) FROM subscriptions WHERE status = 'active'

desc: Find users who churned last month
sql: SELECT user_id FROM cancellations WHERE date >= DATEADD(month, -1, CURRENT_DATE())
SELECT instance_id, status FROM infra_logs WHERE status = 'RUNNING'
SELECT region, sum(sales) FROM orders WHERE quarter = 'Q3' GROUP BY region
SELECT user_id, sum(spend) as total FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total > 10000

desc: Show top 10 users by lifetime value
sql: SELECT user_id, sum(value) as ltv FROM user_stats GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY ltv DESC LIMIT 10

desc: Count errors by error code in last 24h
sql: SELECT error_code, count(*) FROM logs WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY error_code
SELECT country, avg(total_amt) FROM orders JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.id GROUP BY country
SELECT name, join_date FROM employees WHERE extract(year from join_date) = 2024
SELECT (sum(revenue) - sum(cogs)) / sum(revenue) * 100 as margin_pct FROM financials
SELECT email, count(*) FROM users GROUP BY email HAVING count(*) > 1
UPDATE users SET status = 'inactive' WHERE last_login < DATEADD(year, -1, CURRENT_DATE())

desc: Delete temporary tables older than 7 days
sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS temp_analytics_% WHERE created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
SELECT channel, sum(revenue) FROM attribution_table GROUP BY channel
SELECT p.name FROM products p LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.id IS NULL
